PrivacyHoldReason.name: PrivacyHoldReason
PrivacyHoldReason.description: Represents the business or legal purpose for why a record has a Privacy Hold.

Detail.description: The details of the Privacy Hold Reason, such as the business or legal purpose for the hold.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the Privacy Hold Reason.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the account associated with this customer.
